name: Fool's Errand (itch) (Asix)
description:
It seems Whole Fool is on his way to be in an up-and-coming video game from By Just Asix. Before he can catch his flight he'll have to get his affairs in order. Follow Whole Fool as he runs his errands and races to make his flight.

This game is part of an April Fool's joke and is actual a Gameboy game made in GB Studios. I hope you enjoy and I'll be talking more about this project on the Misadventures of Whole Fool page!

Make sure you check out the prequel episode and check out all the other episodes of Misadventures of Whole Fool!

HTML Controls:
Up - Up Arrow / W  
Down - Down Arrow / S  
Left - Left Arrow / A  
Right - Right Arrow / D  
A - Alt / Z / J  
B - Ctrl / K / X  
Start - Enter  
Select - Shift
